text: Joe Flanigan (born January 5, 1967) is an American television actor. He is best known for playing the character Major/Lt. Colonel John Sheppard in Stargate Atlantis. He shares his birthday with Stargate Atlantis co-star Paul McGillion. ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American television actors Category:American television writers Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Joe Flanigan
